metadata.Description: The International Green Technology Fund is a financial mechanism designed to support the development and deployment of green technologies worldwide, focusing on reducing environmental impacts and promoting sustainability.

International Green Technology Fund.Description: The fund finances technology development, focusing on innovative solutions that promote environmental sustainability.
It provides financial assistance to companies and organizations working on pioneering green technologies.
The fund supports startups through investments and guidance, accelerating the commercialization of green technologies.
It awards research grants to academic and research institutions to foster studies in green technology.
The fund contributes directly to achieving the SDGs by promoting technologies that address environmental, economic, and social sustainability.
This fund is a key component of the SEH, providing critical financial resources for sustainable energy projects.
The operations of the fund are coordinated with IRENA to align global efforts in fostering green technology innovations.
